dcterms:creator: Aron Habte
Manajit Sengupta
Anthony Lopez
dcterms:description: The National Solar Radiation Data Base (NSRDB) provides solar resource maps and related meteorological data on a 10-kilometer grid across India, captured through weather satellites on an hourly basis from the year 2000 to 2014.
dcterms:title: National Solar Radiation Data Base (NSRDB)
